heavyweight.translation[0].definitions[0: someone or something that is very important or has a lot of influence
one of the heavyweights of the movie industry
heavyweight.translation[0].definitions[1: a boxer who weighs more than 91 kilograms, and who belongs to the heaviest weight class of boxers
heavyweight.translation[1].definitions[0: a person or organization with a lot of influence and power
The law firm represents several industry heavyweights.
